intro: Microtatorchis celebica, commonly known as the Celebes microtatorchis, is a flowering plant native to the Indonesian island of Sulawesi. It belongs to the family Malvaceae, which includes hibiscus and cotton plants. The plant is characterized by its small, delicate flowers that typically bloom in shades of pink and white. Its leaves are heart-shaped and have a slightly hairy texture. Microtatorchis celebica is often found in moist, shaded environments within tropical forests.
